Отличная игра для выжигания нервов.
Легендарная игра!

Пройти эту игру меня заставили несколько причин: во-первых, я был не в теме о том, что происходит во вселенной франшизы Half-Life, во-вторых, "ЕНТА ЖИ КЛАСЕКА КАК ТАК МОЖНА НИ ПАЕГРАТЬ ЗА ВСЮ ЖЫЗН В ЕНТУ ЕГРУ!1!", да и в-третьих, тёплыми вечерами, заваривая себе чашечку кофе размером со всю мою голову, я люблю поигрывать в "классику" игровой индустрии, и, увидев хорошие скидки на комплект с этой игрой, я решил не терять времени и купить её себе. Изначально хочу сказать кое-что тем людям, которые не любят ждать чего-то: в начале вам придётся прижать вот это всё и ждать окончания заставки, в которой вам объяснят, кто вы, чем занимаетесь и что должны делать.
История Гордона Фримена захватывает с первых минут игры, когда начинается всё движение, а если вы ещё и выбираете максимальный уровень сложности, то приготовьтесь к тому, что вы научитесь ругаться ещё хлеще, чем, возможно, могли, игра заставит вас изрядно попотеть, чтобы вы выжили даже на самых банальных моментах, а хедкрабы в тёмных вентиляциях будут закалять вашу психику своими неожиданными появлениями. Однозначно, это та игра, которую я бы с удовольствием прошёл ещё раз и посоветовал бы всем тем, кто ещё не проходил её!

Appena finito e battuto il boss finale,posso dire solo una cosa: CAPOLAVORO! Ora capisco perchè è considerato uno dei videogiochi più rivoluzionari della storia,anche se sarà difficile spiegherò il perchè:

STORIA: Incredibilmente intrigante nonostante al tempo la tecnologia non permettesse una storia così dettagliata,se oggi possiamo godere di FPS che hanno storie magnifiche è solo grazie a questo gioiello dei videogiochi.

GAMEPLAY: Sorprendentemente divertente e mai ingiusto,mi sono trovato tante volte in situazioni (Nonostante fossi in Difficoltà Facile) dove avevo 10 di vita e poche munizioni,ma questo è colpa mia perchè durante i momenti in cui avevo un sacco di proiettili li sprecavo. Consiglio a chi non ci ha mai giocato di risparmiarli oppure rimarrà fermo per ore!

GRAFICA: Beh,per essere un gioco del 1998 è STUPEFACENTE! Io la prima volta ho giocato a questa versione proprio per godermi l'originale al 100% però consiglio a chi non riesce a giocare con questa grafica di provare la versione Source,che è graficamente simile ma ha dei miglioramenti grazie al Source veramente belli.

Quindi se pensate di provarlo,vi consiglio di prenderlo con i saldi di steam o prendervi l'intero pacchetto valve con i saldi di steam (come ho fatto io) e godervi un capolavoro che,pur se vecchio di due decenni,vi potrà sorprendere!

虽然画质是低配的，FPS很高，但是它的技术要求量很高，特别是困难难度
手雷和C4是根据你走路方式来判定扔的距离（按住W扔的远，跳跃可以扔的高）
还有，这里的M16（或M4）比手枪精准度还差，威力也是，远距离拿手枪打，近距离扫头
简单难度和普通难度没啥区别，就血量和速度
困难难度才是Half-Life，如果你真正通关困难难度说明玩别的mod也有证明
还有！最重要的事情！
千！万！别！开！着！输！入！法！玩！，不然会崩溃

NİCE...

Alright, let us cut to the chase here.

Half-Life is a good game, pretty dated by today's standards, but still a good game. To kick things off, let me list out the...

[h1][u]Negatives:[/u][/h1]

[i][b]—Voice acting:[/b][/i] We are going to be going by today's standards here, the voice acting is bad on its own, but the audio quality of it just makes it worse. Also, a lot of the lines are really cheesy.

[i][b]—Graphics:[/b][/i] The elephant in the room. It looks like something straight out of its era at least. The HD pack (enabled by default for some reason) does not help much and looks really odd with the low-resolution textures. Also, extreme purists will scoff at you and claim that the HD models take away from the "true experience."

[i][b]—Questionable level design:[/b][/i] Enter "On a Rail," the chapter that is spent on a railroad. This idea on paper is not bad, but unless you've played this game more than two times, you are gonna be lost trying to figure out which path is the correct path by frantically shooting signs.

[i][b]—The final chapters:[/b][/i] My biggest complaint and perhaps the worst aspect of this game, Xen. At the very beginning of the game you get a glimpse of Xen and throughout the game you're left wondering what the heck it is and if you're ever going to go back. Well, you do go back, and it is... disappointing. It's just a lot of jumping from platform to platform while occasionally avoiding enemies (or fighting them if you please), and then it ends with a battle against Nihilanth, whose name can not be pronounced no matter how hard you try. Proceeding this is an epilogue that delivers a nice explanation of what you have done from everyone's favorite mutual fiend.

Alright, now that that is out of the way, let us get to the...

[h1][u]Positives:[/u][/h1]

[i][b]—Optimization/compatibility:[/b][/i] Valve is constantly pumping out optimization and compatibility patches for this thing, so it should be plug and play (just open-source the damn engine already you jesters.)

[i][b]—The intro:[/b][/i] "Black Mesa Inbound" is one of the best openings ever. It makes you think that there is so much going on outside of your tram but nothing major really happens. Despite this, however, you are still interested in the world outside the tram and find yourself observing everything that is happening around you. "Black Mesa Inbound" also shows you exactly who you are: a 27-year-old theoretical physicist on his way to work. In addition to this, "Black Mesa Inbound" plants the idea in your mind of how far below the surface you truly are, which comes into play right after the intro. "Anomalous Materials" delivers excellent world building and gives you a feel for your colleagues and your position in this facility. 

[i][b]—The story(telling):[/b][/i] The story itself may seem simple on paper, but once you get into Half-Life 2, it gets a whole lot deeper, and this game is necessary for understanding the full story. Also, the way the story is told completely immerses the player in the world and really makes them feel like they are apart of the world, not the world itself.

[i][b]—The chapters:[/b][/i] They are just fun. I know earlier I said that there are some questionable choices in the level design, but overall you are going to have a great time in pretty much every chapter with the exception of a few. Even these exceptions, however, are still well done in their own regard. In the process of me writing a few chapters that stand out from the rest in terms of its quality, I ended up finding myself listing nearly every chapter. If I had to choose a personal favorite, however, I believe "Forget About Freeman!" and "Lambda Core" take the cake (these two chapters sort of melt into each other and they're both just fantastic.)

[i][b]—The feeling of gradual progression:[/b][/i] You are not just given an option of what guns to choose from at the beginning and it is not like Call of Duty or Halo where you can carry a maximum of two weapons. Instead, it plays out like Doom or Quake where you build up a large arsenal of many different weapons to choose from that differ from each other quite a lot. Just don't use the shotgun, it's unsatisfying.

[i][b]—The weapons:[/b][/i] The protagonist has to have a supporting cast, and he has got a good one (and an iconic one at that.) Instead of something like your fists, you have a crowbar for your melee weapon, which is now one of the most iconic weapons in video games. For pistols/sidearms, you got your standard 9mm semi- and fully-automatic Glock 17 (Beretta M9 in Gearbox's models) and a very powerful but also very scarce in ammunition Colt Python .357 magnum revolver. For your primary weapons, there's an MP5SDA3 with M203Pl (M4A1 with M203 in Gearbox's models) that will be acting as your main weapon for most of the game, a SPAS-12, which, again, is unsatisfying, and the crossbow which can pick off enemies from a distance with ease. For the specialty category, there's the laser-guided RPG missile launcher which is exactly what the name implies, the Gauss Gun, a laser gun on steroids, the Gluon Gun, basically the Proton Packs from Ghostbusters, and the Hivehand, which is a low-damage alien weapon that shoots hornets (but also has an unlimited auto-refilling ammo reserve capped at 8.) Then you've got your explosives, Mk 2 hand grenades, remotely detonated satchel charges, laser tripmines, and finally, to cap it off, the Snarks, alien bugs that you can send out to fight for you. Overall, the diversity in the weapons makes it fun to experiment with them and with the very balanced ammo distribution, you definitely can.

Well, that is my two cents on Half-Life. Again, it is a good game, a really good game, if not dated. If you have not yet played it, do yourself a favor and wait for this thing to go on sale for a buck so you can pick it up. You will not regret it.

Играта трябва да бъде изиграна от всеки един, считащ себе си най-малкото за геймър. Това е една от класиките, които никогa няма да бъдат забравени..Историята е уникална, ако сте геймър който играе заради историята, това е играта за вас. Атмосферата като за игра на миналия век е на ниво. Главният антагонист G-Man(пичът с лукавата мутра и куфарчето) култов е. Протагонистът Freeman ами...думите са излишни. Не се колебайте да закупите този шедьовар. Влезте в ролята на безмълвния доктор и спасете света от извънземното зло.
Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine.

Entiendo que sea un juego viejo, que sea de una época distinta y demás, pero la verdad no le tengo paciencia. Las mecánicas están mal, parece como si Gordon Freeman tuviera patines puestos (se resbala MUCHÍSIMO y parece como si fuera pariente del mismo Usain Bolt por lo rápido que anda). El solo verlo cansa a la vista y es probable que te produzca mareos y hasta descompostura (basado en hechos reales). Reconozco que Half Life fue un antes y un después y uno de los títulos más amados por el mundo gamer, pero que decirles, no es algo que se disfrute, más bien lo juego forzado para de ahí encarar el HL2. Para mi gusto un titulo monótomo, aburrido y hasta frustrante, cosa qie es una lastima por que de verdad intente que me gustara, pero el ¨amor¨ nunca se dio

Пройдя сюжетку за 8 часов я понял, что это были самые скучные 8 часов в моей жизни.
Давайте сразу к делу потому, что я не хочу говорить об этой игре.
Хотя кое-что я скажу, так для справки. Игру купил по сикдке для коллекции и для того, что бы познакомиться с великой серией(да я ни разу не не играл в half-life).
И так, плюсы:
1. Для своего времени это был шедевр игровой индустрии. Но сейчас нет(я знаю, что есть блэк меза). Минус за это я ставить не хочу. Пусть будет плюс.
2. Динамичность. Игра очень динамичная(особенно если банихопить).
3. Молчаливый Гордон.
4. Обильный арсенал оружия.
На этом для меня закончились плюсы.
Минусы:
1.Невнятный сюжет(либо я его не понял).
2. Стрельба из винтовки(даже первая пуля и то не в центр летит).
Собственно на этом всё.
Плюсов 4, минусов 2.
Итог: игру стоит проходить для "галочки". Я прошёл ради того, чтобы пройти half-life 2. Если вам нравиться,то играйте на здоровье. Всем остальм советую воздержать и пройти BlackMesa.
Лично мне игра не зашла, но я её всё равно рекомендую ведь эта одна из легендарных саннинов. Ой, перепутал. Одна из легендарных игр.
Ну, а если этот обзор был вам полезен, то ставьте лайки и коментируйте если, что.

Lembro de ter jogado esse jogo quando criança, mas nunca salvei ele. Depois de velho joguei ele de novo pra ver se ele continua sendo um jogo bom. E sim, Half life continua sendo um jogo bom

Não signfica que não envelheceu mal. Eu gosto de como o jogo é dificil em comparação aos jogos de hoje que qualquer criança cega sem braços consegue jogar. Ao mesmo tempo o jogo tem varias partes de plataforma, que na época era muito comum, mas hoje em dia só é chato.

É bom jogar um jogo que você morre. Com os jogos modernos, a não ser que eu vá para algum lugar que eu não devia, eu raramente morro. Esse jogo te mata varias vezes, faz você explorar o mapa. Descobrir partes secretas...ou seja, como os jogos de antigamente eram.

Além de tudo é um jogo com bastante imaginação. A história é um classico: um experimento cientifico que deu errado. Mas se você prestar atenção verá que é uma história profunda e misteriosa, com um personagem principal que não tem personalidade, sendo assim quem você quer que ele seja.

Não diria que essa geração iria gostar desse jogo justamente por mecanicas que envelheceram mal. Mas pra todos que ligam para jogos como entreterimento de qualidade e não algo para de distrair da sua virgindade e dos seus pais brigando, é um jogo absurdo que sem duvidas continua sendo um classico
